metadata.name: Nebula No. 1 (NFT + Physical Painting)
metadata.description:
NEBULA NO. 1, Physical Painting
Acrylic on canvas, varnished
100 x 120 cm | approx. 40 x 47 inches
2021

This piece is part of a series of three NFTs tied to their physical counterparts.

The First Collector of this NFT will receive the correspondent original physical painting, shipped for free¹ with an Authenticity Certificate signed by the artist Mario Henrique (mario-henrique.com).

To redeem the physical piece, the First Collector has to validate the NFT purchase and provide shipping references to info[a]mario-henrique.com.

============

"I try to be fast and spontaneous when I’m painting - that process should be reflected in the final piece. The observer should be able to infer the physicality of the painting process, when looking at the brush strokes and paint drippings." - Mario Henrique

============

¹ Customs fees and import taxes may apply. For additional information please visit mario-henrique.com/faqs
